name: Little Elf Tanks
description:
Embark on an exciting journey in this thrilling bug blasting adventure! Choose one of four playable characters and join the battle to free your fellow elves from the grasp of a wicked spider army. Each playable character comes with their own set of unique abilities and strengths, giving you the freedom to tackle obstacles in your own way. But beware, your foes won't make your mission easy. In addition to the hoards of gross creepy crawlies, several big boss fights lie in wait to test your skills!

Features:

  • Fast paced overhead shooting gameplay.
  • Over 60 enemy encounters spanning 5 levels.
  • 4 playable characters.
  • Three difficulty settings. Easy, Normal, and Hard.
  • Several challenging boss battles.
  • Unlockable boss rush mode.
  • Charming pixel art and cartoon graphics.
  • An amazing soundtrack.
  • The bugs bleed green goo and it's super gross.
